translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

This will be presented to you by the merchant Natálio Rusca for whom the Government assigns all the beef cattle, which has been consigned to Your Lordship Napoleone Castellini, of Montevideo, contracted for the army.

Therefore, may Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship  
Treasury Department in Piratini, February 11, 1839.  
Domingos José de Almeida  
Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima.  
General Commander of Police of the Department of Alegrete.

February — 11 — 39. Almeida.

Presidency Secretariat of the Republic  
Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima,  
General Commander of Police of the Municipality of Alegrete.  
From the Ministry of the Treasury.
